source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video presents a couple of scenery shots of the bustling St. Mark's Square in Venice, Italy, on a sunny day. The footage captures the iconic architecture of St. Mark's Basilica and the Doge's Palace, with crowds of tourists milling about. Souvenir stands are also visible in the lively and historic European plaza.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This video presents a couple of scenery shots of the bustling St. Mark's Square in Venice, Italy, on a sunny day. The footage captures the iconic architecture of St. Mark's Basilica and the Doge's Palace, with crowds of tourists milling about. Souvenir stands are also visible in the lively and historic European plaza.

bad_caption: This video shows a group of cyclists racing through a narrow mountain pass on a cloudy afternoon. The footage follows the lead cyclist as he accelerates around sharp bends, while several others trail closely behind. Spectators line the roadside, waving flags and cheering as the cyclists speed past. In the background, a cable car moves slowly up the hillside.
